trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Fairless Hills
There were no other sightings in Fairless Hills on or around June 25th 2008
Summary: 6 bright lights in shape of boomerang hovering over the former don poblos site
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home corner of my eye I saw what was a shooting star zoom by at really close altitude which opened my eyes to look around. Go to a red light looked over and saw this object hovering around in the sky. Secind time I have seen this in the same general area. After I saw it the light turned green I drove a few yards turned to look again and it was gone no where to be seen.
